title: Extended Isolation Forest (EIF)
description: Extenstion to the basic isolation forest. Implementation of https://doi.org/10.1109/TKDE.2019.2947676. Code from https://github.com/sahandha/eif
authors: S. Hariri, M. Carrasco Kind, R. J. Brunner

parameters.name: n_trees
parameters.description: The number of decision trees (base estimators) in the forest (ensemble).

parameters.name: max_samples
parameters.description: The number of samples to draw from X to train each base estimator: `max_samples * X.shape[0]`. If unspecified (`null`), then `max_samples=min(256, X.shape[0])`.

parameters.name: extension_level
parameters.description: Extension level 0 resembles standard isolation forest. If unspecified (`null`), then `extension_level=X.shape[1] - 1`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum allowed tree depth. This is by default set to average length of unsucessful search in a binary tree.
